trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"> </xref> az esemény a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: A ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs osztály a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>metódust az üzleti objektumhoz példányhoz való hozzáférés bármely által használt adatok műveletek után a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>vezérlő és az üzleti objektumhoz hajtja végre, de az üzleti mielőtt objektum megsemmisül.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The business object is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Az üzleti objektumhoz használatával érhető el a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up.
trans-unit.target: Adja hozzá a delegált kezelésére, az <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>esemény, van-e hozzáférési nyilvánosan elérhetővé tagokat az üzleti objektumhoz bármely végső munkavégzésre vagy törlése megtörtént.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method is not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>metódus nem hívja a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>szabályozhatja, ha az adatok műveletet hajtanak végre a módszer egy `static` metódus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: No business object instance is created when the method is static.
trans-unit.target: Egyetlen üzleti objektum példánya jön létre, ha a metódus statikus.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>vezérlő kezelni tud dolgozni az alapul szolgáló üzleti objektumhoz, az életciklus különböző időpontokban sok események közzététele.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi táblázat az események és a társított <xref:System.EventArgs>osztályok és az esemény kezelő delegáltak.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Esemény |} EventArgs |} EventHandler |} |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Azonnal az üzleti objektumhoz példányának létrehozása előtt következik be. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, az üzleti objektumhoz példányának létrehozása után azonnal. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, mielőtt az adatok lekérésére. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>
trans-unit.target: Előzheti insert, update vagy delete műveletet végrehajtani. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, miután az adatok lekérésére. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Után fordulhat elő, az insert, update vagy delete műveletet végrehajtani. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, mielőtt olyan üzleti objektumot megsemmisül. |} ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"> </xref> osztály a megadott objektum használatával.

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: Az üzleti objektumhoz, amellyel a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> együttműködő adatok műveletek végrehajtásához.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: Amellyel az üzleti objektumot képviselő objektumot lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> vezérlő adatok műveleteket hajtja végre.

trans-unit.source: If the data operation methods (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed.
trans-unit.target: Ha az adatok művelet módszerek (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, és <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) metódusok, az üzleti példányának vannak objektum, létrejön a metódus végrehajtása előtt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the ObjectInstance property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Az üzleti objektumhoz megakadályozása által az objektum mentésekor objectinstance példányt használ tulajdonságában szereplő minden egyes létrehozott a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>eseménykezelő.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: In subsequent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> events, you can retrieve the business object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A következő <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>események, kérheti le az üzleti objektumot a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: The business object the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> uses to data operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az üzleti objektumhoz az <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> használja az műveleteket; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, ha <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> számára a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref>.
